comment:
* Holds configuration used to create {@link VirtualDisplay} instances. See
 * {@link MediaProjection#createVirtualDisplay(VirtualDisplayConfig, VirtualDisplay.Callback, Handler)}.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: mName
variables.comment: * The name of the virtual display, must be non-empty.

variables.name: mWidth
variables.comment: * The width of the virtual display in pixels. Must be greater than 0.

variables.name: mHeight
variables.comment: * The height of the virtual display in pixels. Must be greater than 0.

variables.name: mDensityDpi
variables.comment: * The density of the virtual display in dpi. Must be greater than 0.

variables.name: mFlags
variables.comment:
* A combination of virtual display flags.
     * {@link DisplayManager#VIRTUAL_DISPLAY_FLAG_PUBLIC},
     * {@link DisplayManager#VIRTUAL_DISPLAY_FLAG_PRESENTATION},
     * {@link DisplayManager#VIRTUAL_DISPLAY_FLAG_SECURE},
     * {@link DisplayManager#VIRTUAL_DISPLAY_FLAG_OWN_CONTENT_ONLY},
     * or {@link DisplayManager#VIRTUAL_DISPLAY_FLAG_AUTO_MIRROR}.

variables.name: mSurface
variables.comment:
* The surface to which the content of the virtual display should be rendered, or null if
     * there is none initially.

variables.name: mUniqueId
variables.comment:
* The unique identifier for the display. Shouldn't be displayed to the user.
     * @hide

variables.name: mDisplayIdToMirror
variables.comment:
* The id of the display that the virtual display should mirror, or
     * {@link android.view.Display#DEFAULT_DISPLAY} if there is none initially.

methods.name: public String getName()
methods.comment: * The name of the virtual display, must be non-empty.

methods.name: public int getWidth()
methods.comment: * The width of the virtual display in pixels. Must be greater than 0.

methods.name: public int getHeight()
methods.comment: * The height of the virtual display in pixels. Must be greater than 0.

methods.name: public int getDensityDpi()
methods.comment: * The density of the virtual display in dpi. Must be greater than 0.

methods.name: public int getFlags()
methods.comment:
* A combination of virtual display flags.
     * {@link DisplayManager#VIRTUAL_DISPLAY_FLAG_PUBLIC},
     * {@link DisplayManager#VIRTUAL_DISPLAY_FLAG_PRESENTATION},
     * {@link DisplayManager#VIRTUAL_DISPLAY_FLAG_SECURE},
     * {@link DisplayManager#VIRTUAL_DISPLAY_FLAG_OWN_CONTENT_ONLY},
     * or {@link DisplayManager#VIRTUAL_DISPLAY_FLAG_AUTO_MIRROR}.

methods.name: public Surface getSurface()
methods.comment:
* The surface to which the content of the virtual display should be rendered, or null if
     * there is none initially.

methods.name: public String getUniqueId()
methods.comment:
* The unique identifier for the display. Shouldn't be displayed to the user.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public int getDisplayIdToMirror()
methods.comment:
* The id of the display that the virtual display should mirror, or
     * {@link android.view.Display#DEFAULT_DISPLAY} if there is none initially.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
